title: S13 E3: [Odessa] Like a Trophy
description:
Take action against gun violence now: Text ACT to 644-33. You are not alone Text SHARE to 741741 to reach a volunteer Crisis Counselor via Crisis Text Line.

*Content warning: Today’s episode discusses emotional and sexual abuse. 

RAINN is the nation's largest anti-sexual violence organization. RAINN created and operates the National Sexual Assault Hotline in partnership with more than 1,000 local sexual assault service providers across the country.

If you or someone you know has been sexually assaulted, help is available, visit https://www.rainn.org/ Or call their telephone hotline: 800-656-HOPE (4673)

SWW’s theme music – “U think U” by Glad Rags, from their album Wonder Under

For more free resources visit SomethingWasWrong.com/Resources

Follow Something Was Wrong on Instagram


See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
